gui.skyblockpv.tab.fishing.information.d: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Ice Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
gui.skyblockpv.tab.fishing.information.m: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Gold Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
<white>Increases your chances of fishing up a </white>
<white><gold>Gold Trophy Fish</gold> in the <red>Crimson Isle</red> by <green>2-20%</green>.</white>
gui.skyblockpv.tab.fishing.information.r: <white>Can be upgraded at the <light_purple>Diamond Essence Shop</light_purple></white>
<white>Increases your chances of fishing up a</white>
<white><aqua>Diamond Trophy Fish</aqua> in the <red>Crimson Isle</red> by <green>2-20%</green>.</white>
